description: We have received your report about the water leakage in the basement. Can you provide more details about the extent of the damage?
The water is pooling near the furnace and has soaked the carpet. It seems to be coming from a crack in the foundation wall.
Thank you for the information. We will send maintenance to assess the situation. Are there any electrical appliances affected by the water?
Yes, the dehumidifier and a couple of power outlets are affected. We have unplugged the dehumidifier for safety.
Understood. Please avoid using the affected outlets. Maintenance will be there within the hour. We will follow up once the initial assessment is done.
Thank you for the prompt response. We will be waiting for the maintenance team.
